titleStmt.title: To the right honorable the House of Lords, assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of the deputy lieutenants, iustices of the peace, and Commons of the county of Essex, on the behalf of themselves, and the county.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "presented ye 9th march"; "march 13 1646".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
